metaData.title: Deewas
metaData.description: Personal Expenses Manager With Powerful AI Features And Simple User Interface

loginPage.Welcome back, please login to continue!: Welcome back, please login to continue!

registerPage.Welcome! Please fill in the details to g: Welcome! Please fill in the details to get started
registerPage.Username must be at least 5 characters: Username must be at least 5 characters

aiPage.Deewas is a personal finance assistant t: Deewas is a personal finance assistant that helps you manage your money wisely

welcomePage.Ever wonder where your money goes - and: Ever wonder where your money goes - and why it's never enough?
welcomePage.Powered by AI, Deewas helps you track, s: Powered by AI, Deewas helps you track, save smarter, and finally feel in control
welcomePage.By trying Deewas, you agree to the: By trying Deewas, you agree to the

onboardingPage.How did would you here about us?: How did would you here about us?
onboardingPage.How do you feel about your finances?: How do you feel about your finances?

onboardingPage.Pick a personality for Deewas assistant?: Pick a personality for Deewas assistant?

onboardingPage.We're excited to have you here. Let's ge: We're excited to have you here. Let's get started on your financial journey together!

aboutPage.Deewas is a modern, user-friendly app de: Deewas is a modern, user-friendly app designed to help you track and manage your personal finances effortlessly
aboutPage.Whether it's budgeting, tracking transac: Whether it's budgeting, tracking transactions, or managing wallets, Deewas has you covered
aboutPage.Manage multiple wallets seamlessly to ke: Manage multiple wallets seamlessly to keep your finances organized
aboutPage.Visualize your spending with beautiful,: Visualize your spending with beautiful, interactive charts
aboutPage.Set budgets and stay on top of your fina: Set budgets and stay on top of your financial goals
aboutPage.Get help from our AI to manage transacti: Get help from our AI to manage transactions effortlessly
aboutPage.At Deewas, we aim to empower individuals: At Deewas, we aim to empower individuals to take control of their finances with intuitive tools and smart insights, making money management simple and stress-free
aboutPage.Join thousands of users who trust Deewas: Join thousands of users who trust Deewas to manage their expenses

helpAndSupportPage.We're here to assist you with Deewas!: We're here to assist you with Deewas!
helpAndSupportPage.Learn how to use Deewas with our detaile: Learn how to use Deewas with our detailed guide
helpAndSupportPage.Reach out to our team for personalized h: Reach out to our team for personalized help
helpAndSupportPage.Find answers to common questions below: Find answers to common questions below
helpAndSupportPage.How do I add a new transaction?: How do I add a new transaction?
helpAndSupportPage.Go to the Transactions page, click ‚ÄúAd: Go to the Transactions page, click ‚ÄúAdd Transaction,‚Äù and fill in the details like name, amount, and category
helpAndSupportPage.Our AI can also help via chat!: Our AI can also help via chat!
helpAndSupportPage.Add them in the Wallets section and trac: Add them in the Wallets section and track separately
helpAndSupportPage.How do I set a budget?: How do I set a budget?
helpAndSupportPage.Navigate to Budgets, click ‚ÄúCreate Bud: Navigate to Budgets, click ‚ÄúCreate Budget,‚Äù and specify the category, total amount, and time range
helpAndSupportPage.What if I forget my password?: What if I forget my password?
helpAndSupportPage.Use the ‚ÄúForgot Password‚Äù link on th: Use the ‚ÄúForgot Password‚Äù link on the login page to reset it via email
helpAndSupportPage.Our support team is available 24/7 to as: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you
helpAndSupportPage.Drop us a message, and we'll get back to: Drop us a message, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

guidePage.Track your income and expenses effortles: Track your income and expenses effortlessly
guidePage.Navigate to the ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äú scree: Navigate to the ‚ÄúTransactions‚Äú screen from the navbar
guidePage.Fill in details: name (e.g., Coffee), am: Fill in details: name (e.g., Coffee), amount (e.g., $5), date, wallet, and category
guidePage.Tip: Use the AI chat to say Add $5 coffe: Tip: Use the AI chat to say Add $5 coffee expense today for a quicker way!
guidePage.Find the transaction in the list: Find the transaction in the list
guidePage.Click the ‚úèÔ∏è icon next to it: Click the ‚úèÔ∏è icon next to it
guidePage.Organize your money across multiple wall: Organize your money across multiple wallets
guidePage.Enter a name (e.g., Cash) and choose an: Enter a name (e.g., Cash) and choose an icon
guidePage.Choose the destination wallet and amount: Choose the destination wallet and amount
guidePage.Click a wallet to see its transactions a: Click a wallet to see its transactions and balance
guidePage.Classify your transactions with custom c: Classify your transactions with custom categories
guidePage.Specify name (e.g., Food), type (e.g., e: Specify name (e.g., Food), type (e.g., expense), and icon
guidePage.Update the name or icon, then save: Update the name or icon, then save
guidePage.Confirm deletion (note: only deletable c: Confirm deletion (note: only deletable categories can be removed)
guidePage.Plan and control your spending with budg: Plan and control your spending with budgets
guidePage.Choose a category, set a total amount, a: Choose a category, set a total amount, and define start/end dates
guidePage.View the budget card to see spent vs: View the budget card to see spent vs
guidePage.Transactions in the category auto-update: Transactions in the category auto-update the budget
guidePage.Modify the total or dates, then save: Modify the total or dates, then save
guidePage.Learn how to master your finances with D: Learn how to master your finances with Deewas
guidePage.This guide will walk you through the cor: This guide will walk you through the core features of Deewas, from managing transactions to setting budgets
guidePage.Check out our support page or contact us: Check out our support page or contact us for further assistance
